title: Pixel 5 - I Was Wrong.
description: Don't Sleep on the Google Pixel 5 Xbox Series X - UI, Load Times, Games, and Graphics:  iPhone 12 Mini vs iPhone 12 Pro Max:  Do(n't) Buy the Surface Laptop Go:  Why Did Sony Do This?! PS5  Too Many Phones.    Check out Austin on Twitch:  Vibe with Matt on Twitch:  Chill with Ken on Twitch:    Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:
